name: Unnamed Megaman Zero Fan Game
description:
Unnamed Megaman Zero Fan Game... A Pantheon Flyer was quietly returning to Neo-Arcadia through the air. However, mysteriously his turbines failed, and now he has to be skillful not to be destroyed! Controls:

Space Bar - Impulse (Jump).

Credits:

Capcom - For creating the Megaman franchise.

Sprites from - Sprites .Inc and Spriters Resource.

Music from - Rockman Zero Remastered Tracks.

Fan Game created by lucasfera15.
